channel.title: IntellijIdea on Ruddra
channel.description: Recent content in IntellijIdea on Ruddra

item.title: Using IntellijIdea/Pycharm Within An Exisiting Virtualenv
item.description: To add a virtual environment to Intellij Idea, You have added Python from virtualenv folder to project SDK. Which means that virtualenv directory’s python( for example venv/bin/python2.7) needs to be added to Intellij Idea project path. |||||||||| For PyCharm >= 2018 As per documentation from Pycharm: In the Project Interpreter page, click the cog icon and select Add.
